original: Hetuṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum dassanena pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na dassanena pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Hetuṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetum na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate tīṇi
